name: Pollination
description:
A short game about pollination of flowers. Made for the Gift Jam 2021.

You must pollinate each flower by pushing it once.

Pollinated flowers will be stuck in place, so plan carefully!

Controls: WASD/arrows to move, Z to undo, R to restart, PgUp/PgDown to change level.

Made in my little engine PuzzLisp, with art by my partner Graciela ♥
